divs: Sighting Details MY FRIEND HAS A CAMERA THAT TAKES A PICTURE WHEN IT SEES MOTION-EVERY 5 SECONDS.HE LIVES IN THE COUNTRY.I HAVE NOT TAKEN ANY MEASUREMENTS YET.THE NEXT DAY HIS DOG WAS SNIFFING THE AREA.THERE IS A PICTURE OF HIM SNIFFING. MY FREIND THINKS IT IS A GHOST.I THINK IT IS A MANAFACTUREDITEM.IN EITHER CASE IT IS SPOOKY. HERE ARE THE PICTURES.
